message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This unique item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. We understand its worth to you is $8000, but we hope this offer will be attractive enough to consider. Should you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.
